dict.acceptation: 慈善（行为）；施舍，捐助；慈善机关；仁爱，宽容；

sent.orig: It is partly a charity-school: you and I, and all the rest of us, are charity-children.
sent.trans: 这是个半慈善性质的学校，你我以及所有其他人都是慈善学校的孩子。

sent.orig: And above all things have fervent charity yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.
sent.trans: 8最要紧的是彼此切实相爱，因为爱能遮掩许多的罪。

sent.orig: Donating millions to disaster relief is charity, give a stranger a smile is also charity.
sent.trans: 捐献几百万救灾是慈善，给陌生人个微笑也是慈善。

sent.orig: At the Charity Dinner, we had a charity auction took place.
sent.trans: 在慈善晚宴，我们有一个慈善拍卖发生。

sent.orig: Charity: giving to charity seems to confer positive benefits ongiver.
sent.trans: l做慈善：捐款给慈善机构好像会给捐赠者带来些好处。
